room_title: Escape room "Deepsky" by EsQape It in Albuquerque
review: The Deepsky room had great puzzles and some really good props! The staff was great and seemed to enjoy having us there. I would recommend it to anyone looking for some group fun!

room_title: Escape room "Deepsky" by EsQape It in Albuquerque
review: We had an exceptional time! The Deepsky room was challenging and lots of fun!

room_title: Escape room "Deepsky" by EsQape It in Albuquerque
review: Deep sky is our favorite room to date. Loved it! Owners are great and so friendly. Always enjoy chatting with them. We love the thought behind both rooms as we have done Roswell too.

room_title: Escape room "Deepsky" by EsQape It in Albuquerque
review: We had a blast even though we didn’t solve the room in time! This was my husband’s and my second escape room and our two friends’ first. Challenging and creatively designed, the room we played (Deepsky) had a lot going on and would be good with a slightly larger group (maybe 6-8). The owners are really nice people, too. We’ll be back, next time with a more organized strategy!
